title: (x) What font is this T from? - Parchment {Mike F}
content:
The font is Parchment. Copyright shows PhotoLettering, Type Solutions and Microsoft. I doubt that you can buy it anywhere by itself. It came bundled with [these older Microsoft applications](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174618/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.asp?FID=132&FNAME=Parchment&FVER=1.05).   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174618im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35541.gif)
author: Mike F
